testsuite.name: UserIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Saving our first user to the database
Updating a saved user changes its properties
Deleting an existing user removes it from the databse
Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error
Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties
Welcome email is generated and sent

error.message: Authentication failed; nested exception is javax.mail.AuthenticationFailedException: 534-5.7.14 <https://accounts.google.com/ContinueSignIn?sarp=1&scc=1&plt=AKgnsbslm 534-5.7.14 Co4u7IN9ixZIWlvypcl_9Qi9_DWxVZVMwjkhh-Wh1ozfinpyzw1TT5Nfa5rg9PfK9QNM6B 534-5.7.14 -y_cUechkqK3Mm6n8FM43K3MaQBZu0sNrvFtJZqUELFPAFOe-jni9kXSNPbZSedr34zkv7 534-5.7.14 k5Gx1K3eh6N_m7He2AoZM4uikcn9lj9Ky9cOyvgnsiiPV_cZV9g-u1ocFWiCwwaRuC8W44 534-5.7.14 QGofskA> Please log in via your web browser and then try again. 534-5.7.14 Learn more at 534 5.7.14 https://support.google.com/mail/bin/answer.py?answer=78754 p143sm1089256ioe.33 - gsmtp
